hero.subtitle: 6 Production-Ready Projects Â· Fast Delivery Â· Clear Milestones Â· <1h Response Â· WCAG 2.1 AA Compliant
hero.description: From price intelligence and webhook orchestration to SaaS analytics and accessibility, each project ships with live demos, tests, API docs, and Docker deployment so you can assess production readiness instantly.

p1.name: Global Price Sentinel
p1.pain: E-commerce sellers manually track competitor prices â€” time-consuming and error-prone.
p1.summary: Automated competitor price intelligence with proactive alerting & reporting.
highlights: Playwright multi-site scraping with proxy rotation and cron scheduler.
Email & webhook alerts plus HTML/PDF comparison dashboards.
Self-serve admin console for thresholds, audit logs, and retry.

p2.name: Event Relay Hub
p2.pain: SaaS platforms need unified webhook management with retry & dead-letter queue.
p2.summary: Unified webhook router with signature verification, retries, and DLQ observability.
highlights: Connect Stripe, GitHub, Slack, or custom providers with secure HMAC checks.
Conditional routing, retries, and dead-letter queue dashboards with telemetry.
Ops console to inspect payloads, replay events, and enforce SLA alerts.

p3.name: SaaS Northstar Dashboard
p3.pain: Startups need to track MRR/retention/NPS, but BI tools are too heavy.
p3.summary: Northstar metrics dashboard for SaaS teams with templates, automation, and investor-ready visuals.
highlights: Template library for B2B, B2C, and e-commerce SaaS with instant KPI scaffolding.
CSV import with cohort, retention, and churn forecasting calculators.
Shareable dashboards, embeddable charts, and Slack/email digests.

p4.name: Doc Knowledge Forge
p4.pain: Enterprises have massive PDF/Word docs and need unified search & knowledge retention.
p4.summary: Document intelligence pipeline turning PDFs into a searchable, summarized knowledge base.
highlights: Batch uploads auto-convert to Markdown with summaries, keywords, and previews.
SQLite FTS search with tag filters, relevance scoring, and snippet highlights.
Knowledge ops dashboard for versioning, retention policies, and exports.

p5.name: A11y Component Atlas
p5.pain: Dev teams need WCAG 2.1 AA components â€” building from scratch is costly.
p5.summary: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant React component system ready for design system rollouts.
highlights: Keyboard and screen-reader support baked into buttons, forms, modals, and tabs.
Storybook documentation with accessibility add-ons, theming, and tokens.
Continuous testing pipelines using axe, Vitest, and visual regression hooks.

p6.name: Insight Viz Studio
p6.pain: Business users need quick chart reports but lack coding skills.
p6.summary: No-code visualization studio that turns spreadsheets into branded reports within minutes.
highlights: Upload CSV or JSON and get chart recommendations with smart defaults.
Drag-and-drop field mapping, theme controls, and annotation overlays.
Export branded PNG/PDF reports or schedule recurring deliveries.
